name: Unstable Landing
description:
Welcome Pilot! You think landing a spaceship is a simple thing? Think again! You start at a high altitude and have to bring this nice spaceship back to the landing platform. But careful you have to land as soft as a feather. You got a useful arrow which will show you the way! And if you think you are good, then try to beat your own record.

Controls:

A or Left Arrow : Steer Left

D or Right Arrow: Steer Right

Space: Thrust
